entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Gibsons
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
